title: Creation's Echo
content:
Creation's Echo Rare 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Elemental Resonance: If the wielder deals Acid, Fire, Lightning, Radiant or Necrotic damage, it becomes resistant to that damage type for 2 turns. Main Hand OnlyTopple This staff pulsess with energy, swiftly attuning itself to the beat of your heart. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 310
